Reviews.Title: Everything you need for your T3i
Reviews.Author: Jodi Moore "Mom of Teens"
Reviews.Content: Awesome set of accessories including commonly selected lens options and tripods.  Other items in the kit are also nice to have like the spare battery and the SD card reader.  I recommend to the novice camera buyer (like me) to get all the stuff you will end up buying eventually, at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal on Cannon T3i Accessory Kit
Reviews.Author: Terry Lee Jones
Reviews.Content: I got this a wek ago and must say it is a great deal for all the things you get in the package you just can't beat it.
